product_name: Merrell Grassbow Air Low Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: Stay cool and connected with the nimble women's Merrell Grassbow Air Low Hiking Shoes, made with ultra-breathable mesh to let air flow while you're working your way up the trail. Molded thermoplastic urethane heel counters provide good support. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes prevent odors from developing. Bellowed tongues keep debris out. Merrell Grassbow Air Low Hiking Shoes include removable EVA footbeds. Grippy outsoles with 3.5mm-deep lugs provide dependable traction on slick trails; winter compound is great for use in cold, wet conditions. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Stay cool and connected with the nimble women's Merrell Grassbow Air Low Hiking Shoes, made with ultra-breathable mesh to let air flow while you're working your way up the trail.
